properties.Tag: Arabic, Political, Palestinian, PFLP, Resistance, Fight, Leader
properties.Title: PFLP leader Abu Ali Mustafa (Mustafa al Zibri) with a rifle and PFLP logo
properties.Description: Abu Ali Mustafa ( aka Mustafa al Zibri) was one of the PFLP leaders. He was killed in 2001. PFLP’s armed wing was renamed Abu Ali Mustafa Brigades

properties.Description: March 30 is the Land Day - an annual commemoration day for Arab citizens of Israel and Palestinians to remember the events of 1976
